statements: SELECT * FROM iot_products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM iot_products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM iot_products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM iot_products ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, inventory_level FROM iot_products WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM iot_products WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, last_updated FROM iot_products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM iot_products WHERE product_category = 'Home Appliances' AND inventory_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM iot_products WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM iot_products WHERE product_name LIKE 'Chair%' ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM locations
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT product_name, serial_number FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, serial_number FROM products WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM locations WHERE products_in_stock < capacity ORDER BY location_name
SELECT * FROM products p JOIN locations l ON p.product_id = l.location_id WHERE p.quantity > 0 AND l.capacity > 0
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, location FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_history ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, action_type, description FROM product_history WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, location FROM product_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM product_history WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' AND action_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, a.alert_type, a.alert_date FROM product_inventory p INNER JOIN product_alerts a ON p.id = a.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, i.quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY p.product_name, w.warehouse_name;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products WHERE category='Clothing';
SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_id, action_type, action_date FROM product_history ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, status FROM device_status WHERE last_checked BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Electronics%';
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM product_inventory INNER JOIN warehouse_locations ON product_inventory.location = warehouse_locations.address;
SELECT device_name, status FROM device_status WHERE status = 'Online' ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
